## Repository structure

- README: this file
- Code
  - Run_instructions.Rmd: more detailed information on what the scripts do and how to use them
  - CHTC_scripts: code to run QIIME1 in a high-throughput computing environment
    - submits/ : .sub files that grab an executable and tell condor how many jobs to run
    - executables/ : run QIIME1 commands
    - scripts/ : move files and make lists of files to run on the submit node
  - miniconda_scripts: code to run QIIME2 in Miniconda
